resources.string: Vanced, laakiin loogu talagalay YouTube Music!\nwuu ka yara wax qabad yaryahay Vanced-ka laakiin baahiyahaaga wuu fulin.
YouTube Vanced waa YouTube-kii android ka caadiga ahaa, laakiin wuu ka fiican yahay!
Ma aqaano wuxuu kani yahay ama ma doonayo inaan isticmaalo midka root-ka ah? Aayar taabo falaadha buluuga ah ee hoose!
Kusii dhufo si aad u aragto waxa isbadalay.
Tani waxay noo ogolaanaysaa inaan uruurino xog ku saabsan shaqaynta app-ka iyo kaydinta xogta khaladaadka dhaca
Linkiyadu waxay ku furmi doonaan Taababka Chrome ee loogu talagalay
Ha kuu soo dhacaan ogaysiisyada marka wax cusub %1$s lasoo galiyo
%1$s faylal ku shubid ah ayaa la helay!
Maamuluhu wuxuu helay dhamaan faylashii loo baahnaa %1$s inuu ku shubmo. Ma rabtaa inaad ku shubto?

Waxaad isticmaalaysaa version-ka Vanced ee loogu talagalay Magisk/TWRP, kaasoo aan hada la taageerin xagana lagama cusboonaysiin karo. Fadlan iska saar lifaaqa Magisk/adoo isticmaalaya kasaaraha Vanced ee TWRP-ga xagiisa.

Si aad ugu shubto Vanced, WAA INAAD xidhaa ka xidhaa MIUI Optimizations xaga fadhiga Developer Settings-ka. (Waad iska indhatiri kartaa digniintan hadaad isticmaalayso version-ka 20.2.20 iyo wixii ka dambeeyay ee nidaamyada barnaamijyada ROM-ka ee kusalaysan xiaomi.eu)
Make sure that you downloaded the app from vancedapp.com, the Vanced Discord server, or the Vanced GitHub
